scripts.build: npm run -w client build && npm run -w server build
scripts.dev: concurrently --kill-others-on-fail "npm run -w server dev" "npm run -w client dev"
scripts.deploy:prepare: npm run build && mkdir -p server/public && cp -r client/dist/* server/public/
scripts.typecheck: npm run -w client typecheck || true && npm run -w server typecheck || true
scripts.replit:simple: concurrently --kill-others-on-fail --restart-tries 3 "npm run -w server dev" "npm run -w client dev"
